nodes.text: Spira was a tropical planet known for its golden beaches. During the High Republic Era, it was a key member of the Galactic Republic and received a sky-island at the Republic Fair on Valo. The Resistance pilot Poe Dameron once took a vacation there, and was reminded of it when tasting a drink at an auction hosted by Nifera Shu on Corellia.
Spira was first mentioned in the theme park attraction Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was originally created for the 1994 Star Wars Legends roleplaying adventure The Spira Regatta.
A preliminary excerpt of the novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi identified Spira as the homeworld of the saberfish. However, the final novel instead stated they were from Tibrin.
